name: Unseen (GBoschiero)
description:
Premise:

A Point and Click Horror adventure with offensive language.

Valerie just came home after a long day at work, and just before she can start to unwind in the evening a special delivery reached on her doorstep, little does she know of the chain of fate that will unleash on her during this night.
How will the story unfold? that all depends on you dear player to find out.

Art By: Sarah Maftoum, Rawad Sarkis          Coding: Giuseppe Boschiero
